targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
    SELECT
        date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ts,
        CAST(sc_bytes AS BIGINT) AS sc_bytes_num,
        c_ip,
        cs_user_agent,
        sc_status,
        cs_uri_stem,

        -- Correct channel extraction: always extract what's after /live/
        regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/live/([^/]+)/', 1) AS channel,

        -- Extract token (string before /live/)
        regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) AS token,

        CASE 
            WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' THEN 'index'
            WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN 'll_index'
            WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' THEN 'index_720p'
            WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8' THEN 'll_index_720p'
        END AS file_type

    FROM cdn_logs_cloudfront_partitioned.access_logs_parquet

    WHERE 
        date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
            BETWEEN timestamp '${date_game} 00:00:00'
                AND timestamp '${date_game_end} 23:59:59'

        AND sc_bytes IS NOT NULL
        AND sc_bytes != '-'
        AND sc_status = '200'

        -- Very important: match ANY /live/ channel
        AND cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/live/%'
),

filtered AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM parsed
    WHERE channel IS NOT NULL
),

minute_level AS (
    SELECT
        date_trunc('minute', ts) AS minute_ts,
        date(ts) AS log_date,
        channel,
        SUM(sc_bytes_num) AS total_bytes_minute,
        (SUM(sc_bytes_num) * 8) / (1024 * 1024 * 60) AS bandwidth_mbps_minute
    FROM filtered
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
),

daily_channel_agg AS (
    SELECT
        log_date,
        channel,
        SUM(total_bytes_minute) AS total_volume_bytes,
        SUM(total_bytes_minute) / (1024*1024*1024) AS total_volume_gb,
        MAX(bandwidth_mbps_minute) AS max_bandwidth_mbps
    FROM minute_level
    GROUP BY 1, 2
),

unique_counts AS (
    SELECT
        date(ts) AS log_date,
        channel,
        COUNT(DISTINCT token) AS unique_tokens,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c_ip) AS unique_client_ips,
        COUNT(DISTINCT cs_user_agent) AS unique_user_agents
    FROM filtered
    GROUP BY 1, 2
),

channel_file_platform AS (
    SELECT
        date(ts) AS log_date,
        channel,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c_ip) AS unique_ips_per_channel,

        SUM(CASE WHEN file_type = 'index' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS index_requests,
        SUM(CASE WHEN file_type = 'll_index' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ll_index_requests,
        SUM(CASE WHEN file_type = 'index_720p' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS index_720p_requests,
        SUM(CASE WHEN file_type = 'll_index_720p' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ll_index_720p_requests,

        approx_distinct(CASE WHEN file_type = 'index' THEN token END) AS unique_tokens_index,
        approx_distinct(CASE WHEN file_type = 'll_index' THEN token END) AS unique_tokens_ll_index,
        approx_distinct(CASE WHEN file_type = 'index_720p' THEN token END) AS unique_tokens_720p,
        approx_distinct(CASE WHEN file_type = 'll_index_720p' THEN token END) AS unique_tokens_ll_720p,

        SUM(CASE WHEN 
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%'
        THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS lg_tv_requests,

        SUM(CASE WHEN 
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR 
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%'
        THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS samsung_tv_requests,

        SUM(CASE WHEN NOT (
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%' OR
            cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%'
        ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS other_platform_requests

    FROM filtered
    GROUP BY 1, 2
)

SELECT
    d.log_date,
    d.channel,
    d.total_volume_bytes,
    d.total_volume_gb,
    d.max_bandwidth_mbps,
    u.unique_tokens,
    u.unique_client_ips,
    u.unique_user_agents,
    c.index_requests,
    c.ll_index_requests,
    c.index_720p_requests,
    c.ll_index_720p_requests,
    c.unique_tokens_index,
    c.unique_tokens_ll_index,
    c.unique_tokens_720p,
    c.unique_tokens_ll_720p,
    c.lg_tv_requests,
    c.samsung_tv_requests,
    c.other_platform_requests
FROM daily_channel_agg d
JOIN unique_counts u
    ON d.log_date = u.log_date AND d.channel = u.channel
LEFT JOIN channel_file_platform c
    ON d.log_date = c.log_date AND d.channel = c.channel
ORDER BY d.log_date, d.channel;
